com.adyen.threeds2.customization

Class ScreenCustomization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adyen.threeds2.customization.Customization
      • com.adyen.threeds2.customization.ScreenCustomization

  • public final class ScreenCustomization
extends Customization
    This class provides methods for the App to pass screen customization parameters to the 3DS SDK.

    Created by Ran Haveshush on 04/10/2018.

      • setStatusBarColor

        public void setStatusBarColor(java.lang.String hexColorCode)
        Sets the color of the statue bar.
        Parameters:
        hexColorCode - The color code in Hex format. For example "#999999".
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - This exception shall be thrown if an input parameter is invalid.

      • getBackgroundColor

        public java.lang.String getBackgroundColor()
        Returns:
        The color code of the challenge Activity's background.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(java.lang.String hexColorCode)
                        throws InvalidInputException
        Sets the background color of the challenge Activity.
        Parameters:
        hexColorCode - The colour code in Hex format. For example "#999999".
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - This exception shall be thrown if an input parameter is invalid.
